This is the build/release note for the Saturn SOC Support Package.


Date: 04/04/2013


Version: 1.00.10.0032


Recent changes:

    

  • 	Libraries are now built with the meta toolkits V2.8.0.0.3.0 and V2.7.4.0.3.2
  • Secondary boot loader: fixed a bug causing sections of over 64k to fail to be correctly zeroed.
  • 	Added bootrom files to the package to facilitate building apps to boot from nvram
  • Added runwithargs.py alongside runwithargs.js to support Codescape 7
  • Fixed an issue with the nvram loader application that would prevent it from working on real hw
----------------------------- 1.00.10.019 --------------------------
  • [sys_config] Fixed incorrect actual frequency returned by getdividervalue
----------------------------- 1.00.10.018 --------------------------
  • [sys_config] Fixed incorrect divider values
  • [img files] Added a new set of img files for using the saturn2 DDR part W971GG6JB-18 (fitted to new saturn bub boards)
  • [img files] Renamed img files containing Micron part specific setup to have Micron in the file names.
  • 	[img files] Added new clock settings for Meta , Sys , DDR . (Now used by default)
----------------------------- 1.00.10.016 --------------------------
  • 	[img files] - Removed writes to DVB-H Link Layer circular buffers - not required on UCCP330
  • 	Updated SPIM tests to bring them in line with SPIM implementation.
  • 	Fixed release notes not updating in package
  • 	Renamed saturn_apis to saturn2_apis
----------------------------- 1.00.10.008 --------------------------
  • 	Fixed race condition in stress test
  • 	Added config files for a wider range of pll settings.
  • Updated to 2.7.1 meta toolchain
  • 	Increased SCLK Low timeout for SCBM
----------------------------- 1.00.10.007 --------------------------
  • intial version












Introduction:



This package contains the source and documentation for the Saturn 2 SOC Support APIs. These APIs are only part of the software deliverables for Saturn. The OS (MeOS), toolchain and various demodulation components are delivered separately. 







Documentation:



Saturn 2 SOC Support.Package Overview - Provides an overview of the SOC Support API software package and its contents. 





Saturn PLL and DDR Setup Guide - Provides details of how to set up the PLL and DDR2 







Links to doxygen API documentation:




    

  • gpio_api.h GPIO Driver
  • scbm_api.h SCB(I2C) Master Driver
  • spim_api.h SPI Master Driver
  • spis_api.h SPI Slave Driver
  • ser_api.h UART Driver
  • usbd_api.h USB Device Driver
  • sys_config.h System configuration functions
  • gdma_api.h Generic DMA driver
